'''''The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien''''' is a book focusing on literary criticism of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.

==Chapters==

*Realms of Mind: those Uncharted Realms
*Realms of Ecology: Tolkien and the Physical Universe
*Realms of the Perilous
*Realms of Inspiration
*Realms of Gender
*Realms of Immortality: Tolkien and Shakespeare

==External links==

*[http://www.alt-tolkien.com/r27uncharted.html Review by Martin Baker on Middle-earth Reunion: the Alternative Tolkien Society]
